littlecontraptions.ponder.basic_assemble: Powered Barge Assemblers mount attached structures to passing Contraption Barges
Without a redstone signal, it disassembles passing barge contraptions back into blocks
Similar to Cart Contraptions, you can attach larger contraptions using Chassis and Super Glue
littlecontraptions.ponder.basic_tug.head: Just the basics about tugs
littlecontraptions.ponder.basic_tug.text: Tugboats can be placed anywhere on water
Tugboats will naturally pathfind to Tug Route waypoints
Putting the Tug Route item in the Tug will start its journey!
Sometimes tugboats will get stuck on corners. This is fixable by using a corner guide rail
If the corner guide rail is facing the wrong way, shift-right click it to flip it
